Edges-Diabolist -- Male Human Seasoned Diabolist
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d4 Strength: d4 Vigor: d10
Skills (16 Points):
Alchemy: (sma) d4 Healing: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d12
Athletics: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d4 Performance: (spi) d4 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Focus: (spi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1
Skill Notes:
Ugly: -1 Persuasion
Thin Skinned: -2 vs. Taunt
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 4; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (3 points): Arcane Background (Diabolist); Hell's Wrath; Infernal Armor Hindrances: Grim; Illiterate; Thin Skinned; Ugly Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Diabolist): Has Armor Interference+, Corruption+, and Summoning features
Illiterate: Cannot read or write
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Robe With Hooded Cloak Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d4+d4 R3"); Sap (d4+d4); Shuriken (d4+d4 R3"); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Grim: Provoked (-2 to affect other opponents) by any successful Taunt; lasts until a Joker is drawn
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Diabolist): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Armor Interference+: In light, medium, or heavy armor, suffers -4 arcane skill rolls and cannot use arcane edge features
Corruption+: Critical failure on arcane skill inflicts additional or increased hindrance until next advance
Hell's Wrath: Bolt, Blast, and Burst inflict +2 damage
Infernal Armor: May cover apparel with a glow that gives self +2 Armor
Summoning: May use Summon Ally to conjure demonic soldiers for 4 PP or hellhounds for 5 PP
